eslintConfig.description: The name of the ESLint configuration file.

lintFilePatterns.description: One or more files/dirs/globs to pass directly to ESLint's `lintFiles()` method.

force.description: Succeeds even if there was linting errors.

fix.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

cacheLocation.description: Path to the cache file or directory.

maxWarnings.description: Number of warnings to trigger nonzero exit code - default: `-1`.

ignorePath.description: The path of the `.eslintignore` file. Not supported for Flat Config.

noEslintrc.description: The equivalent of the `--no-eslintrc` flag on the ESLint CLI, it is `false` by default.

hasTypeAwareRules.description: When set to `true`, the linter will invalidate its cache when any of its dependencies changes.

cacheStrategy.description: Strategy to use for detecting changed files in the cache.

rulesdir.description: The equivalent of the `--rulesdir` flag on the ESLint CLI.

resolvePluginsRelativeTo.description: The equivalent of the `--resolve-plugins-relative-to` flag on the ESLint CLI. Not supported for Flat Config.

reportUnusedDisableDirectives.description: The equivalent of the `--report-unused-disable-directives` flag on the ESLint CLI.

printConfig.description: The equivalent of the `--print-config` flag on the ESLint CLI.

errorOnUnmatchedPattern.description: When set to false, equivalent of the `--no-error-on-unmatched-pattern` flag on the ESLint CLI.

suppressAll.description: Suppress all existing violations. This is equivalent to the `--suppress-all` flag on the ESLint CLI. Requires ESLint v9.24.0 or higher.

suppressRule.description: Suppress violations for specific rules. This is equivalent to the `--suppress-rule` flag on the ESLint CLI. Requires ESLint v9.24.0 or higher.

suppressionsLocation.description: Specify the location of the suppressions file. This is equivalent to the `--suppressions-location` flag on the ESLint CLI. Defaults to 'eslint-suppressions.json' in the project root. Requires ESLint v9.24.0 or higher.
